long_description: Sometimes you just don't know what you'll encounter on the approach. Toss the Outdoor Research Wrapid(TM) gaiters in your pack and you're ready for scree fields and short glacier crossings. Water-resistant blend of nylon, polyester and spandex keeps snow and rocks out of your trail shoes; lightweight fabric won't weigh you down when the gaiters are in your pack. Gaiters go on easy with the rip-and-stick front closures. Lightweight BioThane(R) instep straps are adjustable and removable. Silicone prints inside the heels grip on your boots. Outdoor Research Wrapid(TM) gaiters have pivoting boot hooks that grab your shoe laces.
short_description: Sometimes you just don't know what you'll encounter on the approach. Toss the Outdoor Research Wrapid(TM) gaiters in your pack and you're ready for scree fields and short glacier crossings.
